interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: FOAMIST Thickening Caffeine 3 Peptides Complex Hair Conditioner for hair loss, thin hair 250ml / 8.4 fl.oz. Review Date: 2022/07/30 Store: FOAMIST Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Brand': 'FOAMIST', 'Item Form': 'Conditioner', 'Active Ingredients': 'caffeine,peptides,triclosan', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Hair Loss,Thickening,Hair Growth', 'Package Dimensions': '8.19 x 6.38 x 1.89 inches; 9.59 Ounces'} Review Text: I'm on the fence regarding the merits of this conditioner. I have aging [I'm 74] thin baby fine color treated hair with only normal seasonal hair loss. On the first try, I washed my hair using my normal shampoo and applied the conditioner following the directions, leaving it on 3 mins then rinsing it out. After one use, I'm not overly impressed with its ability to add thickness to my strands but it did leave my hair soft and didn't weigh it down.

Its a thick cream with a pleasant odor and on short hair [pixie] a little goes a long way. I plan on using it over the next few weeks hoping eventually it will thicken and volumize my thin hair and encourage growth. If I see a major difference I'll revise this review. The bottom line is that for some, it may be worth trying. Review Title: MAY TAKE SOME TIME TO SEE RESULTS ON THIN BABY FINE HAIR Rating: 4.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Sigma 3DHD - Precision Brush - Pink {'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Form': 'Wand', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Ferrule Material': 'Brass', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '2 x 1 x 8 inches', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2 x 1 x 8 inches; 0.35 Ounces', 'Item model number': '3DP02'} This is another great brush from Sigma! I now have 4 Sigma brushes and all four are of outstanding quality. This little brush does exactly what Sigma's website says it will do (see the video on their site) and I highly recommend it. I no longer see any reason to pay $40 and up for one makeup brush when Sigma offers such a large variety of brushes at half the price! Another win for Sigma R-NEU 200 Cotton Rounds, 100% Natural Turkish Cotton Makeup Remover and Facial Cleansing Cotton Round Pads, Waffle Textured Hypoallergenic Cotton Wipes, 2.25 Inch Diameter (200 Pack) R-NEU {'Size': '2.25 Inch (Pack of 200)', 'Brand': 'R-NEU', 'Material': 'Cotton', 'Product Benefits': 'Cleansing', 'Shape': 'Round', 'Package Dimensions': '9.17 x 4.8 x 2.28 inches; 3.77 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'yhua8a-654', 'UPC': '696292837730', 'Manufacturer': 'R-NEU'} Swisspers is my usual brand but for some strange reason I decided to give these a try. They're "ok" ...they are soft and absorbent but they tend to shed fibers even when wet. As I use these around my eye area that is not a good thing! Will return to my usual rounds. JUST OK 4D Silk Fiber Lash Mascara Black, Natural Waterproof Mascara Extra Long Lash,Thick Thickening and Lengthening, No Clumping, No Smudging, Lasting Voluminous Eyelashes Dramatic Extension Mascara SIKEMAY {'Color': 'Black', 'Special Feature': 'Smudge Proof, Non Clumping', 'Brand': 'SIKEMAY', 'Specialty': 'Waterproof, Hypoallergenic', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '8.9 x 4 x 1.1 inches; 2.57 Ounces', 'UPC': '764690676852', 'Manufacturer': 'SIKEMAY'} First off I wear contact lens and so far I've had no adverse reaction. I've only tried it once and it stayed put for 24 hrs, even though a shower! Now that's what I call really waterproof! I don't normally sleep in makeup of any kind but wanted to give it an "all night" durability test. Woke up the next morning....was still there! Expected at least some "mascara" marks on my pillowcase but there was nary a mark. But my biggest surprise came when I awoke without "racoon eyes"!!! I usually wear "tubing" mascaras as other formulas end up under my eyes within a few hours, I actually expected this mascara to do the same.

Volume and length? It definitely added length. I use Latisse so my lashes have stayed long as I've aged and this mascara provided additional length. As to volume, not so much. However, I only used one coat so it may indeed give the volume advertised with another coat. I really did not notice any "fibers" and being a lens wearer perhaps that's not a bad thing. The formula is not thick so it applies smoothly without leaving clumps. It was fairly easy to remove with a cotton pad soaked in micro-cellular water. All in all, if you are looking for staying power this mascara is worthy of a try.

The packaging is unique! Hans Holbein's portrait of a young Princess Elizabeth [later Queen Elizabeth I] just caught my eye. I found the square shape vs round tube a lot easier to hold and the brush is a standard design found on many other mascara brands. WORTHY OF A TRY FOR STAYING POWER ALONE PLUS- No Racoon Eyes! EASYDEW Fill Up Volume Spot 0.67 fl oz -Anti-Aging Filler Spot Good for Topical Wrinkle Care with Hyaluronic Acid I Moisturizer with Instant Filling Effect and Skin Renewal | For Topical Area EASYDEW {'Brand': 'EASYDEW', 'Scent': 'Aloe Vera', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Active Ingredients': 'Hyaluronic acid', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Product Dimensions': '1.46 x 0.91 x 5.71 inches; 1.41 Ounces'} I just started using this filler and at this time I don't feel its had the appropriate time for me to see any change in the depth of my fine lines. So this will be a 1st impression review that I will revisit after I've used this for a few weeks.

[From the box/packaging] This product is made by the Korean, Daewoong Pharmaceutical [DN Co.] Company which according to the company's website is a global healthcare company that strives to contribute to the beauty molding industry in Korea and around the world.

The gel has an easy to use unique packaging that doses out just the right amount needed to pat over wrinkles and fine lines. The gel, when first applied, feels slightly sticky but does not remain so on the skin and it worked well under foundation with no pilling or reaction.

Being a skin care/cosmetic junkie and always a bit skeptical, I did a little digging into the ingredients. It does contain proven HA [hyaloronic acid] which is a good start in my opinion. I did find one ingredient I wanted to know more about namely:

EGF [epidermal growth factor) a/k/a SH-OLIGOPEPTIDE-1: - From the INCI website - Epidermal growth factor is a protein that stimulates cell growth. I encourage you to research this ingredient for additional information for informed decision making.

Right now, I'm skeptically giving this 3 stars for seemingly falling into the Cosmeceuticals [cosmetic products that claimed to have medicinal or drug-like benefits]

11/29/20 Update: I've used this for a few weeks now and my smile lines, although not doing a disappearing act, they are less noticeable. I've not had any adverse reaction to this gel and have added a star due to the results I've seen. Note : a little goes a long way. SMILE LINES NOW LESS NOTICEABLE 8 Rolls White Eyelash Extension PE Tape, Adhesive Fabric Eyelash Tape, Lash PE Tape for Eyelash Extension Supply, 1/2'' x 10 Yards Cuckoo {'Brand': 'Cuckoo', 'Material': 'Paper', 'Number of Items': '8', 'Compatible Material': 'Fabric', 'Product Dimensions': '5.12 x 1.97 x 1.97 inches; 4.23 Ounces'} Although this tape is designed for eyelash extensions, I wanted to see how it worked when applying eye-shadow. I use the makeup artist's Scotch tape trick for applying eye shadow [see Dominique Sachse's, Caught on Tape U tube video] and love the effect. However, Scotch tape doesn't stick to skin evenly/smoothly leaving gaps and when its peeled off it takes some foundation with it. I was hoping this would work better and I've not been disappointed. It's easy to apply and goes on smoothly with no wrinkles or gaps and it removes without taking foundation with it. Leaving you with a nice winged effect to your shadow. Now that I think about it, it should also work for winged eyeliner. PERFECT ALTERNATIVE FOR EYESHADOW SCOTCH TAPE TRICK👍👍👍 UJM Magnetic Eyelashes 10 Pairs Reusable Magnetic Eyelash and Eyeliner Kit Natural Look False Lashes with Tweezers No Glue Needed Waterproof Magnetic Lashes UJM {'Brand': 'UJM', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '8 x 4 x 0.4 inches', 'Material Feature': 'Gluten Free', 'Item Form': 'Pair', 'Mounting Type': 'Eyelash Glue', 'Product Dimensions': '8 x 4 x 0.4 inches; 2.89 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'UJM-010'} These are natural looking lashes that were easy to apply. The magnetic liner's brush is tapered to a point allowing me to make a thin less noticeable line that stayed put all day. The lashes removed easily and the liner was gone with one swipe of Micellar Water. My only complaint is that it did seem to take a while for the liner to dry, but then I'm a newbie at magnetic lashes so this may not be out of the ordinary. NICE NATURAL LOOKING REASONABLE PRICE Mirror Flower Nail Clippers Set 2Pcs, No Splash Nail Clippers for Fingernail and Toenail, Medical Grade Stainless Steel, Sharp Stainless Steel Flat/Oblique Nail Clipper, Trimmer Set for Men and Women Mirror Flower {'Package Dimensions': '5.39 x 3.74 x 0.67 inches; 2.89 Ounces', 'UPC': '742703082661'} We needed to replace our worn out nail clippers and these have been a good choice. Made of stainless steel they're lightweight yet strong and open and close smoothly. The blades are sharp enough for even clean cuts and the angled pair are perfect for pesky hang nails. The nail clipping slots are something I've never encountered before but its a rather ingenious idea!

Thanks for reading this review and I hope its helpful NICE STAINLESS STEEL CLIPPERS TIANG Facial Steamer, Nano Ionic Mist Face Steamer, Hydrating Mist Sprayer Water Oxygen Injection, Nano Steamer Portable Mist Humidifier, for Face Mini Spa Rejuvenation, Moisturizing Refreshing TIANG {'Brand': 'TIANG', 'Item Form': 'Liquid, Oil, Lotion, Spray', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Use for': 'Face', 'Product Dimensions': '7.09 x 1.61 x 1.61 inches; 6.17 Ounces', 'UPC': '757249753050'} My first thought was that this was another gimmick but being a skincare junkie had to try it. I'm so glad that I did as it exceeded my expectations to the point that I've overlooked a few things I'd normally dock it on.

First use: My usual routine is to wash my makeup off and immediately apply HA [Hyaluronic acid] to relieve the resulting dry tight feeling. I filled this sprayer with HA serum and at first, didn't feel anything but cool air hitting my face and wondered if any serum was even coming out. Then suddenly the tightness was gone and my face felt like it was covered with a moisture mask. When applying HA with my fingers it always took a minute or two to soak in, not so with this sprayer the results were immediate! Although the Nano mist is so fine its impossible to see, the end results is an amazing feeling of soft fully moisturized skin.

With this sprayer you can chose to use serums, toners or water so your not limited to only water like other Nano sprayers. This sprayer is well made and the USB cord is included, the liquid chamber is small [perhaps two tablespoon capacity] easy to fill and it only used a tiny amount of serum to cover my face and neck.

The only Cons are the USB port's location on the bottom so it must be laid on its side to charge {that's weird} and the instruction booklet could use a little help. But, as stated at the beginning of this review I'm so impressed with how my skin feels I'm forgiving the aforementioned transgressions and giving this a 5 star rating.

Honestly, I don't normally get excited about skin care tools but this one is an exception and its made me a Nano spray believer. Highly recommend.

I hope you find this review helpful. NOT A SKINCARE GIMMICK GIVES AMAZING RESULTS Garnier Whole Blends Softening Shampoo Bar for Fine to Normal Hair, Oat Delicacy, 2 Oz, 1 Count (Packaging May Vary) Garnier ['Raise the bar on shampoo! Introducing a bar full of care for your hair that cleanses and lathers like a liquid shampoo, with zero plastic packaging. The nourishing and foamy formulas soften, protect, and revitalize hair, delivering shiny and healthy-looking strands that are cleansed with no harsh effect. Formulated with 94% plant-based ingredients, the shampoo bars are blended without silicones, preservatives, soap and dye. Bonus: Each easy-to-use bar lasts up to 40 washes. The fast-rinsing formulas are 97% biodegradable and dermatologist-tested for safety. To use, wet hair and the solid shampoo to make it foam, hold the bar and lather from roots to tips, massage scalp and rinse. Follow with your favorite Garnier Whole Blends shampoo or conditioner for added nourishment. New Whole Blends Shampoo Bars are available in four blends for your hair needs, packaged in 100% recyclable and Forest Stewardship Council certified cardboard boxes: Whole Blends Restoring Honey Treasures Shampoo Bar for dry and damaged hair, Whole Blends Hydrating Coco & Aloe Vera Shampoo Bar *Sulfate Free* for normal hair, Whole Blends Softening Oat Delicacy Shampoo Bar for fine to normal hair, Whole Blends Strengthening Ginger Recovery Shampoo Bar for weak hair.'] {'Brand': 'Garnier', 'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Hair Type': 'Fine Hair,Normal Hair-', 'Scent': 'Honey', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '2.99 x 2.91 x 1.26 inches; 2 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'Garnier Hair Care', 'Country of Origin': 'France'} My husband recently switched from liquid shampoos to bars and now prefers them. He made the switch after trying several liquid shampoos that not only didn't help his thinning dry hair they irritated his scalp.

Garnier, being a well known brand, I wanted him to try this one and right now its his #2 choice from the 4 he's tried. It hasn't irritated his scalp and he's so far happy with how his thinning, fine hair looks and feels.

Thanks for reading and I hope this review is helpful HUSABND HAPPY NO SCALP IRRITATION FERYES Makeup Sponge Holder with Makeup Sponge– Eco-Friendly Silicone Beauty Make Up Blender Case and Dry & Wet Use Foundation Sponge for Travel - Khaki (MS Khaki) FERYES {'Brand': 'FERYES', 'Color': '(MS Khaki)', 'Material': 'Silicone', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Makeup', 'Package Dimensions': '3.19 x 2.48 x 2.44 inches; 1.76 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'LEYIX', 'Country of Origin': 'China'} Wish I'd thought of this! Whenever I travel I use to keep my sponge in a zip lock bag for obvious reasons. Although it never got moldy that was my fear, this holder is a god send to anyone who travels. But of course its also great for at home storage. Super soft and easy to pop your sponge in and out. Great idea and wonderful gift, recommend PERFECT SPONGE HOLDER AND GIFT IDEA By Terry Hyaluronic Pressed Hydra-Powder | Transcluscent | Infused with Hyaluronic Acid | Vegan By Terry {'Product Dimensions': '2.2 x 2.2 x 0.6 inches; 0.64 Ounces'} OMG am I glad I tried this powder. I'm 70 and my once oily skin is now normal so the addition of HA prompted me to give it a try. Its so finely milled that it goes on light as air and disappears into your foundation. I only use a tiny amount of powder on my T-zone, but with slightly oily eyelids, shadow tends to crease even with primer so I tried it on my lids. After my eye cream and primer, I dusted it lightly over my crease area and applied shadow. My shadow stayed put with O creasing! And, unlike other powders I've tried on my lids, this one didn't enhance my slightly crinkly lids! This one is worth the $$. LIGHT AS AIR / STOPS SHADOW CREASING / WORKS WELL ON OLDER SKIN FOAMIST Thickening Caffeine 3 Peptides Complex Hair Conditioner for hair loss, thin hair 250ml / 8.4 fl.oz. FOAMIST {'Brand': 'FOAMIST', 'Item Form': 'Conditioner', 'Active Ingredients': 'caffeine,peptides,triclosan', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Hair Loss,Thickening,Hair Growth', 'Package Dimensions': '8.19 x 6.38 x 1.89 inches; 9.59 Ounces'} I'm on the fence regarding the merits of this conditioner. I have aging [I'm 74] thin baby fine color treated hair with only normal seasonal hair loss. On the first try, I washed my hair using my normal shampoo and applied the conditioner following the directions, leaving it on 3 mins then rinsing it out. After one use, I'm not overly impressed with its ability to add thickness to my strands but it did leave my hair soft and didn't weigh it down.

Its a thick cream with a pleasant odor and on short hair [pixie] a little goes a long way. I plan on using it over the next few weeks hoping eventually it will thicken and volumize my thin hair and encourage growth. If I see a major difference I'll revise this review. The bottom line is that for some, it may be worth trying. MAY TAKE SOME TIME TO SEE RESULTS ON THIN BABY FINE HAIR
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Brand Loyalty:** The user continues to exhibit strong loyalty to established brands, prioritizing innovative solutions that enhance quality and functionality. Their recent purchase emphasizes a focus on high-performance products tailored to specific hair care needs, further underscoring their commitment to sustainable beauty practices.

- **Value-Conscious:** They remain discerning in their selection of beauty products, balancing affordability with efficacy. This is reflected in their choice of multifunctional items designed to address diverse hair concerns, highlighting a budget-conscious yet quality-oriented mindset.

- **Quality Focused:** The user values effective formulations, showing a preference for products that offer both results and sensory enjoyment. Their experience with hair conditioners confirms their desire for convenience and effective performance, particularly for daily routines.

- **Frequency of Use:** Regular engagement with hair care products is evident, supporting their dedicated approach to maintaining a comprehensive beauty regimen.

- **Cosmetics and Skincare Enthusiast:** Their investment in functional hair care solutions indicates a keen interest in enhancing both aesthetic appeal and hair health, demonstrating a willingness to explore products that meet diverse needs.

- **Product Review Behavior:** The user is known for providing thoughtful feedback, especially regarding the effectiveness and user-friendliness of hair care products. They are open to reevaluating their opinions as they track long-term results.

In summary, this user effectively combines a commitment to quality beauty solutions with a mindful, value-driven approach, continually seeking products that offer sustainable enhancements to their personal care routine.
